de.must.markup
Class MainStd

java.lang.Object
  HttpServlet
      de.must.markup.MustServlet
          de.must.markup.MainStd
Direct Known Subclasses:
Main
public abstract class MainStd
extends MustServlet

Central servlet for all requests. It separates sessions from each other and delegates the request to the appropriate Session object. Inactive session will be removed.

getCurrentSession

public SessionStd getCurrentSession(GeneralizedRequest request)
Returns the current session of the request. If the session could not be identified a new session is created.

Parameters:
request - an HttpServletRequest object
Returns:
the current session

getCurrentSessionByCookie

public SessionStd getCurrentSessionByCookie(GeneralizedRequest request)
Returns the current session of the request by using cookies. If the session could not be identified a new session is created.

Parameters:
request - an HttpServletRequest object
Returns:
the current session

getSessionClass

protected abstract java.lang.Class<? extends SessionStd> getSessionClass()
Returns the session class to use.
